docs.abstract: Salman Rushdie's open letter to India's Prime Minister when Satanic Verses was first banned.
docs.lead_paragraph: In 1988 a rising novelist penned an open letter to then Prime Minister Rajiv Gandhi in The New York Times, after his book was banned in India.

headline.main: How Did the Eurostar Lose Its Luster?

docs.snippet: Rendezvous's editor spots a metaphor for European decline in the current state of the continent's faded two-decades-old supertrain....
docs.abstract: Rendezvous's editor spots a metaphor for European decline in the current state of the continent's faded two-decades-old supertrain.
docs.lead_paragraph: BETWEEN PARIS AND LONDON -- What has happened to the Eurostar, this train I so envied as an American university student studying in Paris?

docs.snippet: A 7,000-square-foot, four-bedroom apartment that was owned by the director M. Night Shyamalan was first listed for $18.5 million in 2010....
docs.abstract: A 7,000-square-foot, four-bedroom apartment that was owned by the director M. Night Shyamalan was first listed for $18.5 million in 2010.
docs.lead_paragraph: The director M. Night Shyamalan - whose breakthrough film, "The Sixth Sense," told the story of a boy empowered to see and talk to the dead - was finally able to commune with a living buyer for his TriBeCa penthouse after more than a year, selling it for $9.5 million, the biggest sale of the past week, according to city records.

headline.main: Time for a Fresh Approach to Bankruptcy Fees

docs.snippet: Chapter 11 cases take place against a backdrop of employee layoffs, discontinued pension benefits and unpaid suppliers, so it is perhaps not surprising that much of the debate over fees is overheated....

headline.main: Time for a Fresh Approach to Bankruptcy Fees

docs.snippet: Chapter 11 cases take place against a backdrop of employee layoffs, discontinued pension benefits and unpaid suppliers, so it is perhaps not surprising that much of the debate over fees is overheated....
docs.abstract: Chapter 11 cases take place against a backdrop of employee layoffs, discontinued pension benefits and unpaid suppliers, so it is perhaps not surprising that much of the debate over fees is overheated.
docs.lead_paragraph: The executive office of the United States Trustee plans to revise professional fee guidelines, especially as they apply to lawyers retained in big Chapter 11 cases.

headline.main: At Men's Fashion Shows, A Mix of Aspiration and Powerful Intrigue

docs.lead_paragraph: The movies often keep fashion designers in duds, as we saw at Miuccia Prada's fall men's show in Milan and a few days later at Rick Owens in Paris. But these designers approach the imagery very differently.
